qas.question: Fachhochschulen first came about in the early years of what decade?
Fachhochschulen favor an education in what, as opposed to research?
In addition to technology, Fachhochschulen offer courses in social science, medicine, design, and what other discipline?

context: Fachhochschulen were first founded in the early <a0_0>1970s<a0_0/>. They do not focus exclusively on technology, but may also offer courses in social science, medicine, <a2_0>business<a2_0/> and design. They grant bachelor's degrees and master's degrees, and focus more on <a1_0>teaching<a1_0/> than research and more on specific professions than on science.
